message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Let's split it evenly down the middle. A fair deal is better than risking inflation eating our money!
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Okay Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering a slight advantage for you, but this ensures we both get a decent amount before inflation eats away at it too much more.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, this is as low as I'm willing to go
